bank.customer module¶

class bank.customer.Customer(value, userID_owner, userID_users=[])[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents a user with low-level priveledges Users only having these priveledges are usually customers

addHistory(event)[source]¶

Adds an event to the history

Parameters:event (string) – Event that has take place (only accepted requests)
getHistory()[source]¶

Retrieves history of this account

getOwner()[source]¶

Retrieves owner of the bank

getRequests()[source]¶

Retrieves request of account

Retrives accounts owned by this account

getUsers()[source]¶

Retrieves priveledged users of the bank

getValue()[source]¶

Retrieves value held within bank

removeRequest(reqNum)[source]¶

Removes request from request list

Parameters:reqNum (int) – Index of request
requestDelta(delta)[source]¶

Rquests the withdrawl or deposit into customer’s account

Parameters:delta (float) – Amount to request funds

bank.passwordAuthentication module¶

class bank.passwordAuthentication.Password(approvedUsers)[source]¶

Bases: object

addAutheticatedUser(userid, password)[source]¶

Adds autheticated user using UUID and SHA512 password hashing

Parameters:
  • userid (string) – User ID that user has chosen
  • password (string) – Password to attempt to authenticate userid
authenticate_password(userid, password)[source]¶

Autheticates Passwords using UUID and SHA512 password hashing

Parameters:
  • userid (string) – User ID that user has chosen
  • password (string) – Password to attempt to authenticate userid
hashUsername(userID)[source]¶

Hashes provided username for hased user id

Parameters:userid – User ID that user has chosen
readEncrypted(filename, dest='./')[source]¶

Imports all usernames and passwords from a txt file File must be formatted using _writeEncrypted function NOTE: All previous passwords will be deleted and replaced

Parameters:
  • filename (string) – filename of txt file
  • dest (string) – location to write txt file
writeEncrypted(filename, dest='./')[source]¶

Writes all usernames and passwords to a txt file

Parameters:
  • filename (string) – filename of txt file
  • dest (string) – location to write txt file
